name: Combat Casting
text: You are adept at spellcasting when threatened or distracted.
benefit: You get a +4 bonus on concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability when casting on the defensive or while grappled.
text_zh: 你适应在受到威胁或分心的情况下施法。
benefit_zh: 防御式施法或被擒抱时，施展法术或类法术能力的专注检定获得+4加值。
